game_description: Relax in your chair and defend your base from waves of enemies. Choose from a variety of towers, each with its own unique abilities, to create the perfect defense strategy. Upgrade your towers to make them more powerful and withstand the onslaught of enemies. As you progress through the game, you will unlock new towers and upgrades. You will also face more challenging enemies, so you will need to use your strategic skills to stay ahead of the curve. Test your strategic skills against challenging enemies and see how far you can get.
review_1: At mission N6 after 11 wave i can't do nothing with my controllers,no upgrade towers, no touch spells, can u fixed it plz,thx If u will fix it 5 stars game
